des:
[Sharp Air] skill allows you to control the most popular features of your Sharp Air Purifier with Alexa.

In order to use this skill, you will need to download and install the Sharp Air app on your mobile device and register at least one Sharp Air Purifier. Account Linking is required.

Model:
Sharp Plasmacluster Ion Air Purifier models with Wi-Fi connectivity released after May 2020.

What you can do with this skill.
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to turn on the air purifier
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to turn off the air purifier
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to clean the air
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to set the mode to POLLEN
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to set the mode to SLEEP
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to set the mode to EXPRESS CLEAN
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to set the fan to LOW / MEDIUM / HIGH
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to tell me the current operation mode

Up to 14 air purifiers can be controlled using Sharp Air skills.

When more than one air purifiers are connected, you need to specify the room name to control each air purifier.
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to turn on the air purifer [in the bedroom]
Alexa, ask Sharp Air to set the mode to EXPRESS CLEAN [in the living room]
